messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

please action submit your time cards for approval please action submit your cards for approval hi please can you review timecards below confirm action required have submitted these timecards number times raised issue with past was confirmed was problem was fixed but have started receive again previous reference number approved but showing submitted let know if there anything needed thanks for your help sent december please action submit your cards for approval dear you receiving because you have cards haven submitted for approval please note enough only enter your but also make you submit your for approval take corrective actions case your submitted card gets rejected below breakdown your submitted cards please submit for approval your accordingly possible country submitted cards card status entered entered entered total submitted cards submitted cards statuses explained error usually happens when you log calendar view for period longer than days then delete one entry causes timecard switch error fix you should add back for deleted or delete entire timecard using right hand side menu recreate again rejected card was rejected by one approvers please correct card entries accordingly resubmit entered status timecard when only one or few days entire timecard have entered saved cards status passed entered validation but gone next submission step for any card issues you can resolve please wait but raise corresponding incident through portal for resolutions

message.reasoning:
**Categorizing Ticket Text**

I'm currently focused on categorizing the IT ticket based on the text. The options are in front of me: Hardware, HR Support, Access, Miscellaneous, Storage, Purchase, Internal Project, and Administrative rights. The text mentions "time cards for approval" and "submit," which points strongly towards a category, but I need to be sure before I make the call.


**Confirming Category Choice**

I've carefully reviewed the ticket text again. The phrases "time cards for approval," "submit," "review," "rejected," and "resubmit" leave no doubt. This definitively falls under "HR Support," aligning with time tracking and submission. I am ready to finalize my categorization.
